text:
Hi Megan, I am HubSpot Specialist and HubSpot Certified Developer.  Please check my work at <https://www.oappsit.com/portfolio/>
my HubSpot Profile:  <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/hub-devs>

I received a request for custom email templates - it's not something we offer, does anyone have a template already developed that would meet some or all of these requests that you'd be willing to offer at a decent price for them? I'm happy to make the referral.

I don't have any major needs that aren't being met by the out-of-the-box drag-and-drop templates, but more than anything I'd love to add CSS shapes! Swoops and waves and stuff. Also, ideally, a hero image-type module for greater accessibility, vs. baked-in text. Oh, and brand font if possible.

So:
-css shapes
-hero module
-brand font
-also maybe blog module

Hi Jennifer
We can use the css shapes, hero modules, font, etc on the email templates.
But some of email clients like outlook aren't rendering some of them properly.
So we need to use images instead of css shapes, backup font for brand fonts, etc
Please DM me if you want to know more.
Thanks
Thanks all - I was able to find someone already :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Megan, We're HubSpot Solutions Provider. Check our profile here: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/solutions/b2bscope>. Let us know if you are still looking for any CMS development related things. Thanks, Mitesh
